msg: Updating the LDAP Studio DSML Parser jar in the dependencies repository.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Modifying DSML Parser. The method getCurrentSearchResultEntry() of the SearchResponse class was throwing an exception (ArrayOutOfBounds) if there was no SearchResultEntry in the List.

author: niklas
msg: * DIRMINA-314: LoggingFilter will now log each event to different loggers. The loggers share a common prefix which is configurable. By default this prefix will be the name of the logger used by SessionLog.
* Made SessionLog.getLogger() public and added SessionLog.getPrefix().

* The logger and prefix used by SessionLog can now be configured using the static SessionLog.setPrefix() and SessionLog.setLogger() methods. This is easier than having to add an attribute to the session.

author: mreutegg
msg: JCR-247: Child axis support for XPath predicates
- limit predicates to location deref steps
